price: да упозорава онога ко је жив, и да се обистини Реч о казни за невернике.
arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيّٗا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: liyundhira man kāna ḥayyan wayaḥiqqa al-qawlu ʿalā al-kāfirīna
